name: Drill for your life
description:
Dig (and move) pressing your left mouse button. You can also jump pressing your right mouse button. The goal is to get to the bottom as fast as possible. If you drill a block with a skull on it you die.

Note: Get closer to block to check whether they're deadly or not.

Made in hour game for 1h game jam (http://onehourgamejam.com/)
